peregrine.controller
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.controller.Controller

public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

Main interface for running a map reduce job in Peregrine. The controller communicates with worker nodes which will then in turn will run jobs with your specified Mapper, Merger and/or Reducer.

submit

public Batch submit(Batch batch)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Add a job to the pending queue for later execution. If there are no jobs executing or in the queue the batch will be executed immediately.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

exec

public void exec(Batch batch)
          throws java.lang.Exception
Execute a batch of jobs.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

processBatchSubmissions

public void processBatchSubmissions()
Foreground batch submission handler that waits for batch jobs to be added to the submission queue and then executes them. This process ALL batch requests including current and future requests.

processCurrentBatchSubmissions

public boolean processCurrentBatchSubmissions()
Process only currently submitted batch jobs. Return true if at least one batch was executed and false if there were non executed.
